name: Dancing for Cats
description:
Welcome to Dancing for Cats, a game by me, Tyler Rhodes for
A Game By It's Cover Jam 2021

Direct Cats in the Art of Dance!

________________________________

Click and hold the glowing orb to direct the cats as they dance in the moonlight

Press SPACE for New Dances, but you may have to wait for the cats to finish their current dance first!

Press R to Reload the Scene, and ESC to exit (on downloadable version)

_______________________________

Based on the famicase design "Dancing for Cats" by Ruthie Edward

Special Thanks to:

WeaverDev

Design and Deploy

Jayanam Games

Dorian Zgraggen

Music made using [LOFI CHIP-HOP MACHINE] by fricochet
